scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Lata
scrape.text: I'm wavering between not liking this and thinking it was ok at best. The rage-filled narrator and everyone else featured in the story is awful, monstrous even, psychopathic. I got bored around the 40% point, and finished this only because I had to for my book club. I appreciated that the author was asking questions about who is actually valuable in society and what kinds of behaviour are acceptable, but I found that he let his PoV character just go on too long.
